metadata.title: Tuesday, 3rd October, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade Mkushi-Musofu-Mundawanga road in Mkushi District to bituminous standard;
(b) if so, what mode of financing will be used for the project;
(c) when the project will be implemented; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to introduce an equitable allocation of Constituency Development Fund to each constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister ofInfrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct bridges at the following crossing points on the Chiswishi River in Milenge Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Chabukabaushi; (ii) Mulumbi; and (iii) Mulungushi;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of each project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of each project is. 62. Mr Miyutu (Kalabo Central) - to ask theMinister of Health:
(a) whether the Government distributed any mosquito nets in Kalabo District in 2022;
(b) if so, how many nets were distributed;
(c) how many nets are earmarked for distribution in 2023; and
(d) what long term measures are being taken to eradicate malaria.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the Kafumbwe-Kalimeta road in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) when the following feeder roads will be rehabilitated:
(i) Kawaza-Chisindiko; and (ii) Dole-Boma.
(a) when the Government will procure the following equipment in order to fully operationalise Old Lundazi District Hospital in Lundazi District:
(i) beds and mattresses; (ii) x-ray machine; and (iii) laboratory equipment;
(b) what the cause of the delay in procuring the equipment is; and

(c) when additional doctors and other medical staff will be deployed to the Hospital.
